name: TAL Global
tag_list: risk-management, security, counter-terrorism, cyber-security, emergency-management, protection, investigations
overview:
TAL Global is an international security consulting and risk management firm that provides a comprehensive array of investigative, disaster mitigation planning and risk management services. Our extensive international network of professionals enables us to provide our clients with the highest level of security and loss prevention services around the globe. Our commitment to an impeccable standard of ethics has earned us an unparalleled international reputation for professionalism and excellence among many Fortune 500 corporations.

Catastrophic incidents, whether natural or manmade, are rarely predictable, but the better the advance preparation for crisis, the more likely a situation can be mitigated, yielding a more positive outcome. In fact, emergency preparedness is often the critical factor that determines long-term survival of organizations in the face of the unexpected. TAL Global recognizes the integral value of security and crisis management within business and governmental planning processes. We understand the negative impact a disaster can have on the bottom line. We work together with our clients to provide assessment, planning, management and training that enable them to weather any storm – real or figurative.

Businesses and governmental agencies must also be prepared to deal with the ever-changing methods for theft of intellectual and real property and the growing challenges of securing tangible assets and information. TAL Global employs state-of-the-art assessment and investigative tools to help our clients optimize their access and protection strategies. We support and complement existing internal security operations, providing the needed expertise to diffuse and eliminate predatory intellectual property situations.

TAL Global’s service concept is based on creating a group of strategic alliances, which affords our clients cost-effective and reliable resources to assess, plan and manage the full spectrum of services world-wide. Service levels are fully scalable to fit the particular needs of an organization; TAL Global professionals can provide both on-site and off-site operations. We understand the sensitive nature of many investigative and security issues, we operate with the utmost discretion and confidentiality in each and every situation. Our professionalism and complete transparency has earned us international recognition as a leader in the field of investigational services.

Protecting people, assets and information is core to our comprehensive services offerings. We invite you to learn more about TAL Global.
